Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_start
Interaction.Text: I know what you’ve been up to! You can’t fool me!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_01
Interaction.Text: These accusations are completely unfounded. You have no evidence whatsoever.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_02
Interaction.Text: I… I do! You’re wrong!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_03
Interaction.Text: Really, now? Please, by all means. Show me.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_04
Interaction.Text: It’s… y-you… ugh! We all know what kind of cheating, no-good scoundrel you are! It’s no coincidence! You killed the captain!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_05
Interaction.Text: All I have ever done is preserve and protect the interests of this ship.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_06
Interaction.Text: All you’ve ever done is preserve your own shady interests! And I won’t let you get away with it anymore!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_07
Interaction.Text: Hear, hear! No evildoings shall be gotten away with under the watchful eye of yours truly.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_08
Interaction.Text: Oh shut up, you fop. Go polish your gears elsewhere.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_09
Interaction.Text: Ah, mon coeur! You wound me with your wicked words!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_10
Interaction.Text: Bart, this is not the time. We have to bring her to justice.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_11
Interaction.Text: Justice? On a pirate vessel? You are a fool.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_12
Interaction.Text: Without me, this ship would be nothing. You think the captain was leading this mess? Hardly. I’ve been captaining this ship for years while they claimed the title for it.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_13
Interaction.Text: The only sensible course of action is for me to continue in that position.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_14
Interaction.Text: But if you truly harbor the delusion that residing in the brigg will prevent me from doing my job, then I suppose I could entertain you.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_15
Interaction.Text: Then go! We’ll get more done without you sneering at everyone, anyway! You have no respect for this crew, and no right to call yourself a captain of this ship!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_16
Interaction.Text: Our captain was someone who knew better than to demean and threaten us like this. Our captain was a good person!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_17
Interaction.Text: And you, you’re just a criminal! So get down into that brigg before I... before I…!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_18
Interaction.Text: Ma cherie, there is no need for such threats! Fear not, for in this sea of chaos, I shall step forth to lead and protec--

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_19
Interaction.Text: Fair enough, Creesy. You have made your choice. I would hate to see you strain yourself apprehending me.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_20
Interaction.Text: But whether I’m in the brigg or standing on this deck, I’ll be captain yet. And you will sorely regret addressing your superior with so little tact.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_exit_QM
Interaction.Text: That… woman! I just - I can’t-

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_22
Interaction.Text: Oooooogh! She is everything that’s wrong with piracy, and nothing that’s right!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_23
Interaction.Text: Your poor heart is burdened with sorrow, mademoiselle… I see it in your eyes! It pains me to see it! My own heart aches enough at this loss, and yet, with your agony, I cannot go on...

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_24
Interaction.Text: What? … oh, ah - it’s ok, Bart.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_25
Interaction.Text: Surely you must rest! I, Bartholomieu Disquefloppe IV, will carry your heavy burden as rightful captain of our beautiful ship. Be not afraid.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_26
Interaction.Text: I, uhm… thanks, Bart. But I’m going to set things straight. Just try not to cause any trouble.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_27
Interaction.Text: And if you see Quartermaster Bonney come out of her brigg, you let me know right away! My speaker is always on.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_28
Interaction.Text: You have my word, ma cherie! No crookedness shall slip beneath my gaze.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_exit_SM
Interaction.Text: Hear me, mes amis! Lend me your ears! Our dear, dashing, clever captain has perished!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_30
Interaction.Text: Those who wish to mourn their untimely passing should follow me to the helm, where we may lay roses and candles in their memory!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_31
Interaction.Text: Come, come! There is much to be done!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_exit_FM
Interaction.Text: The captain is… dead?

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_34
Interaction.Text: What am I supposed to do now?

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_35
Interaction.Text: Did the first mate say something about a service?
